comments.body: I think this timeout can be further reduced in this case (1ms or less).

I have some upcoming work to use [a fake scheduler](https://doc.akka.io/api/akka/2.6/akka/testkit/ExplicitlyTriggeredScheduler.html) rather than real timeouts in these tests, which makes the actual value of this timeout meaningless (because we advance time programmatically).

Are you OK if we make those changes instead?
